scheduling.description: Meeting scheduling templates with HubSpot booking link

london_meeting.name: London Meeting - In Person
london_meeting.use_when: Decent-sized brand, PE firm, adviser, or high-value contact
london_meeting.subject: Great to connect — let's meet in London
london_meeting.body:
Hi {first_name},

Great to hear from you — I'd love to meet.

I'm typically in London on Wednesdays and Thursdays. Here's a link to find a time that works:

{booking_link}

Looking forward to it.

Best,
{sender_name}

phone_call.name: Phone Call - Remote
phone_call.use_when: Smaller brand, initial outreach, or below threshold for in-person
phone_call.subject: Let's arrange a quick call
phone_call.body:
Hi {first_name},

Thanks for reaching out. I'd be happy to jump on a call to discuss further.

Here's a link to book a convenient time:

{booking_link}

Speak soon.

Best,
{sender_name}

follow_up.name: Follow Up - Post Meeting
follow_up.use_when: After an initial meeting to recap and set next steps
follow_up.subject: Great meeting — next steps

nda_request.name: NDA Exchange
nda_request.use_when: When an NDA needs to be exchanged before sharing information
nda_request.subject: NDA for your review
nda_request.body:
Hi {first_name},

As discussed, please find attached our mutual NDA for review.

Once signed, we'll be happy to share the detailed information pack.

Please let me know if you have any questions or require any amendments.

Best,
{sender_name}

info_pack.name: Information Pack
info_pack.use_when: Sending detailed information after NDA is signed
info_pack.subject: Information pack as discussed
info_pack.body:
Hi {first_name},

Further to our conversation and with the NDA now in place, please find attached the information pack.

Key highlights:
{highlights}

Happy to walk through this in more detail — let me know a good time.

Best,
{sender_name}

quick_responses.description: Short pre-built responses for common inbound messages

acknowledge.name: Acknowledge & Schedule
acknowledge.body: Thanks for getting in touch. I'll take a look and come back to you shortly. In the meantime, if you'd like to book a call, here's my calendar: {booking_link}

not_right_now.name: Polite Decline
not_right_now.body: Thanks for reaching out. This isn't quite the right fit for us at the moment, but I appreciate you thinking of us. Happy to stay in touch for the future.

more_info.name: Request More Info
more_info.body:
Thanks for this. Could you send over a bit more detail? Specifically:

- A brief overview of the business
- Key financials (revenue, EBITDA)
- What you're looking to achieve

Happy to arrange a call once I've had a chance to review.
